unnormalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian auto scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches, and trust me, you don't want to miss out. It's like Diwali for gearheads!
normalised: Alright folks, buckle up! The Indian auto scene is buzzing with new vehicle launches, and trust me, you don't want to miss out. It's like Diwali for gearheads!

unnormalised: Just last week, Mahindra unveiled their much-anticipated XUV900 at a swanky event in Gurgaon. Word on the street is it's a real head-turner. They're claiming improved mileage, going all the way upto 25km/l, and a plush interior that could give a Maharaja's palace a run for its money. Early bird bookings have reportedly crossed 10,000 already!
normalised: Just last week, Mahindra unveiled their much-anticipated X U V nine hundred at a swanky event in Gurgaon. Word on the street is it's a real head-turner. They're claiming improved mileage, going all the way up to twenty five kilometer per liter, and a plush interior that could give a Maharaja's palace a run for its money. Early bird bookings have reportedly crossed ten thousand already!

unnormalised: Then there's Tata Motors, who are rumored to be launching the updated Nexon EV Max with a bigger battery pack around October. Expect a longer range, closer to 500 km on a single charge. That's almost a Mumbai to Pune road trip without needing a pit stop! Good news for those planning a quick getaway to Lonavala.
normalised: Then there's Tata Motors, who are rumored to be launching the updated Nexon E V Max with a bigger battery pack around October. Expect a longer range, closer to five hundred kilometer on a single charge. That's almost a Mumbai to Pune road trip without needing a pit stop! Good news for those planning a quick getaway to Lonavala.

unnormalised: Not to be outdone, Maruti Suzuki is teasing a new compact SUV. They're keeping details under wraps tighter than Dr. Sharma's secret chai recipe, but insiders are whispering about a hybrid engine and a starting price under Rs. 8 Lakhs. If that's true, it could be a game changer.
normalised: Not to be outdone, Maruti Suzuki is teasing a new compact S U V. They're keeping details under wraps tighter than Doctor Sharma's secret chai recipe, but insiders are whispering about a hybrid engine and a starting price under rupee eight lakh. If that's true, it could be a game changer.

unnormalised: And for those with a bigger budget (think Ambani level!), Mercedes-Benz is apparently bringing in the AMG G63 S 4x4². It’s probably the size of a small flat measuring around 300 sq ft. But hey, you wouldn’t be buying it for its fuel efficiency!
normalised: And for those with a bigger budget (think Ambani level!), Mercedes-Benz is apparently bringing in the A M G G sixty three S four by four squared. It’s probably the size of a small flat measuring around three hundred square feet. But hey, you wouldn’t be buying it for its fuel efficiency!

unnormalised: So, stay tuned for more updates. It's going to be a wild ride, people! Don't forget to check out your local dealerships for test drives. Happy driving!
normalised: So, stay tuned for more updates. It's going to be a wild ride, people! Don't forget to check out your local dealerships for test drives. Happy driving!
